caption: This is a pop rock piece. There is a female vocalist singing melodically at the forefront. The melody is being played by a wide-sounding strings section and an acoustic guitar. The bass guitar is playing the root notes in the background. The rhythmic structure is provided by a simple acoustic drum beat. The song is in minor key. The atmosphere is sentimental and filled with longing. This piece could be included in the soundtrack of a teenage drama movie or TV series.
